questions.question: As a result of the Spanish-American War, the US saw the need to build the Panama Canal b/c...

choices.answer: new colonies had been acquired in Africa
Spanish opposition to the canal had ended
the United States navy could now move quickly between oceans
US railroads couldn't transport manufactured goods

questions.question: Which of the following was a cause of the United States entering World War 1?

choices.answer: German practice of unrestricted submarine warfare
Germany selling Texas to Mexico
Japan bombing Pearl Harbor, Hawaii
None of the above

questions.question: The explosion of the USS Maine & practice of yellow journalism played a significant role in...

choices.answer: the public’s support for the Spanish-American War
the acquisition of Florida
the creation of the Open Door policy
the purchase of Alaska

questions.question: During World War I, what was President Woodrow Wilson’s purpose in sharing the Fourteen Points?

choices.answer: asking Congress for additional funding for the war effort
proposing war crimes trials for leaders of enemy nations
suggesting a peace plan to prevent future wars
calling for military alliances against aggressor nations

questions.question: The Roosevelt Corollary (1904) to the Monroe Doctrine proclaimed the right of the US to...

choices.answer: impose trade restrictions on European imports
intervene in the internal affairs of Latin American nations
promote democracy in Africa
determine the border between Alaska and Canada

questions.question: One effect of Schenck v. United States (1919) was...

choices.answer: prohibiting the president from implementing a military draft
restricting the formation of defense alliances
preventing the wartime internment of citizens
limiting freedom of speech during wartime

questions.question: The Great Migration during World War I refers to the movement of...

choices.answer: Factory workers from the Northeast to the South
African Americans to northern cities to find work
Communists deported to Russia as undesirable immigrants
Refugees fleeing from eastern Europe to the United States

questions.question: The United States tried to avoid involvement in World War I by following a policy of

choices.answer: economic boycotts
collective security
neutrality
military preparedness

questions.question: After WWI, senators who opposed US participation in the League of Nations argued that...

choices.answer: limit the power of the president
make trade with nonmember nations more difficult
force the country to end traditional military alliances
involve the nation in future world conflicts

questions.question: Which of the following was true of the idea of "White Man's Burden"?

choices.answer: It was used to build support for US imperialism
It led to the US establishing colonies overseas
Neither 1 or 2
Both 1 and 2
